info.title: Selling Partner API for Services
info.description: With the Services API, you can build applications that help service providers get and modify their service orders.

GetServiceJobByServiceJobIdResponse.description: The response schema for the GetServiceJobByServiceJobId operation.

payload.description: The payload for the GetServiceJobByServiceJobId operation.

errors.description: An unexpected condition occurred during the GetServiceJobByServiceJobId operation.
Encountered errors for the CancelServiceJobByServiceJobId operation.
Encountered errors for the CompleteServiceJobByServiceJobId operation.

payload.description: The payload for the GetJobs operation.

errors.description: An unexpected condition occurred during the GetServiceJobs operation.

SetAppointmentResponse.description: Response schema for add or reschedule appointment operation.

appointmentId.description: New appointment id generated during add or reschedule appointment operation.

warnings.description: Warnings generated during add or reschedule appointment operation.

errors.description: Errors occurred during during add or reschedule appointment operation.

JobListing.description: The payload for the GetJobs operation.

totalResultSize.description: Total result size of the query result.

nextPageToken.description: A generated string used to pass information to your next request.If nextPageToken is returned, pass the value of nextPageToken to the pageToken to get next results.

previousPageToken.description: A generated string used to pass information to your next request.If previousPageToken is returned, pass the value of previousPageToken to the pageToken to get previous page results.

jobs.description: List of job details for the given input.

ServiceJob.description: The job details of a service.

createTime.description: The date and time of the creation of the job, in ISO 8601 format.

serviceJobStatus.description: The status of the service job.

x-docgen-enum-table-extension.description: Indicates that the service for the service job is not complete.
Indicates that the service job is cancelled.
Indicates that the service is performed and the service job is closed successfully.
Indicates that an appointment for the service job has not been scheduled.
Indicates that the service job is not actionable due to an unexpected exception.
Indicates that the appointment time preference given by customer cannot be serviced by the service provider.
Indicates that the customer payment has been declined.

scopeOfWork.description: The scope of work for the order.

seller.description: Information about the seller of the service job.

serviceJobProvider.description: Information about the service job provider.

preferredAppointmentTimes.description: A list of appointment windows preferred by the buyer. Included only if the buyer selected appointment windows when creating the order.

serviceOrderId.description: The Amazon-defined identifier for an order placed by the buyer, in 3-7-7 format.

associatedItems.description: A list of items associated with the service job.

serviceLocation.description: Information about the location of the service job.

ServiceJobId.description: Amazon identifier for the service job.

OrderId.description: The Amazon-defined identifier for an order placed by the buyer, in 3-7-7 format.

ScopeOfWork.description: The scope of work for the order.

asin.description: The Amazon Standard Identification Number (ASIN) of the service job.

title.description: The title of the service job.

requiredSkills.description: A list of skills required to perform the job.

Seller.description: Information about the seller of the service job.

sellerId.description: The identifier of the seller of the service job.

ServiceJobProvider.description: Information about the service job provider.

serviceJobProviderId.description: The identifier of the service job provider.

phone.description: The phone number of the buyer.

isPrimeMember.description: When true, the service is for an Amazon Prime buyer.

AppointmentTime.description: The time of the appointment window.

startTime.description: The date and time of the start of the appointment window, in ISO 8601 format.

durationInMinutes.description: The duration of the appointment window, in minutes.

x-docgen-enum-table-extension.description: Indicates that an appointment is scheduled.
Indicates that the appointment is cancelled.
Indicates that the appointment is completed.

appointmentTime.description: The time of the appointment window.

assignedTechnicians.description: A list of technicians assigned to the service job.

rescheduledAppointmentId.description: The identifier of a rescheduled appointment.

Technician.description: A technician who is assigned to perform the service job in part or in full.

appointmentTime.description: The time of the appointment window.

uploadingTechnician.description: The identifier of the technician who uploaded the POA.

uploadTime.description: The date and time when the POA was uploaded, in ISO 8601 format.

x-docgen-enum-table-extension.description: Indicates that the type of proof of appointment uploaded is a dummy signature.
Indicates that the type of proof of appointment uploaded is a customer signature.
Indicates that the type of proof of appointment uploaded is a dummy receipt.
Indicates that the type of proof of appointment is a receipt.

AssociatedItem.description: Information about an item associated with the service job.

asin.description: The Amazon Standard Identification Number (ASIN) of the item.

quantity.description: The total number of items included in the order.

orderId.description: The Amazon-defined identifier for an order placed by the buyer, in 3-7-7 format.

x-docgen-enum-table-extension.description: Indicates the item is yet to be shipped.
Indicates the item has been cancelled.
Indicates the item is shipped but not delivered.
Indicates the item is delivered.

brandName.description: The brand name of the item.

estimatedDeliveryDate.description: The date and time of the latest Estimated Delivery Date (EDD) of all the items with an EDD. In ISO 8601 format.

itemDeliveryPromise.description: Promised delivery information for the item.

ItemDeliveryPromise.description: Promised delivery information for the item.

startTime.description: The date and time of the start of the promised delivery window, in ISO 8601 format.

endTime.description: The date and time of the end of the promised delivery window, in ISO 8601 format.

ServiceLocation.description: Information about the location of the service job.

serviceLocationType.description: The location of the service job.

x-docgen-enum-table-extension.description: Indicates the service for the service job is performed at the customers home address.
Indicates the service for the service job is performed at the service providers store.
Indicates the service for the service job is performed remotely.

address.description: The shipping address for the service job.

Address.description: The shipping address for the service job.

name.description: The name of the person, business, or institution.

addressLine1.description: The first line of the address.

postalCode.description: The postal code. This can contain letters, digits, spaces, and/or punctuation.

countryCode.description: The two digit country code, in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format.

startTime.description: The date, time in UTC for the start time of an appointment in ISO 8601 format.

durationInMinutes.description: The duration of an appointment in minutes.

ErrorList.description: A list of error responses returned when a request is unsuccessful.

Error.description: Error response returned when the request is unsuccessful.

code.description: An error code that identifies the type of error that occurred.

message.description: A message that describes the error condition in a human-readable form.

details.description: Additional details that can help the caller understand or fix the issue.

x-docgen-enum-table-extension.description: Error
Warning

WarningList.description: A list of warnings returned in the sucessful execution response of an API request.

Warning.description: Warning returned when the request is successful but execution have some important callouts on basis of which API clients should take defined actions.

code.description: An warning code that identifies the type of warning that occurred.

message.description: A message that describes the warning condition in a human-readable form.

details.description: Additional details that can help the caller understand or address the warning.

get.description:
Gets service job details for the service job indicated by the service job identifier you specify.

**Usage Plan:**

| Rate (requests per second) | Burst |
| ---- | ---- |
| 20 | 40 |

For more information, see "Usage Plans and Rate Limits" in the Selling Partner API documentation.

400.description: Request has missing or invalid parameters and cannot be parsed.

403.description: Indicates that access to the resource is forbidden. Possible reasons include Access Denied, Unauthorized, Expired Token, or Invalid Signature.

404.description: The resource specified does not exist.

413.description: The request size exceeded the maximum accepted size.

415.description: The request payload is in an unsupported format.

422.description: Unprocessable Entity. Unable to process the contained instructions.

429.description: The frequency of requests was greater than allowed.

500.description: An unexpected condition occurred that prevented the server from fulfilling the request.

503.description: Temporary overloading or maintenance of the server.

parameters.name: serviceJobId
parameters.description: A service job identifier.

put.description:
Cancels the service job indicated by the service job identifier you specify.

**Usage Plan:**

| Rate (requests per second) | Burst |
| ---- | ---- |
| 5 | 20 |

For more information, see "Usage Plans and Rate Limits" in the Selling Partner API documentation.

parameters.name: cancellationReasonCode
parameters.description: A cancel reason code that specifies the reason for cancelling a service job.

put.description:
Completes the service job indicated by the service job identifier you specify.

**Usage Plan:**

| Rate (requests per second) | Burst |
| ---- | ---- |
| 5 | 20 |

For more information, see "Usage Plans and Rate Limits" in the Selling Partner API documentation.

parameters.name: serviceJobId
parameters.description: An Amazon defined service job identifier.

get.description:
Gets service job details for the specified filter query.

**Usage Plan:**

| Rate (requests per second) | Burst |
| ---- | ---- |
| 10 | 40 |

For more information, see "Usage Plans and Rate Limits" in the Selling Partner API documentation.

400.description: Request has missing or invalid parameters and cannot be parsed.

errors.message: Invalid Input

403.description: Indicates that access to the resource is forbidden. Possible reasons include Access Denied, Unauthorized, Expired Token, or Invalid Signature.

404.description: The resource specified does not exist.

413.description: The request size exceeded the maximum accepted size.

415.description: The request payload is in an unsupported format.

429.description: The frequency of requests was greater than allowed.

500.description: An unexpected condition occurred that prevented the server from fulfilling the request.

503.description: Temporary overloading or maintenance of the server.

parameters.name: serviceOrderIds
parameters.description: List of service order ids for the query you want to perform.Max values supported 20.

parameters.name: serviceJobStatus
parameters.description: A list of one or more job status by which to filter the list of jobs.

x-docgen-enum-table-extension.description: Jobs which are not serviced.
Jobs which are cancelled.
Jobs successfully completed.
Jobs which are pending schedule.
Jobs which are not fulfillable.
Jobs which are on hold.
Jobs for which payment was declined.

parameters.name: pageToken
parameters.description: String returned in the response of your previous request.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: A non-negative integer that indicates the maximum number of jobs to return in the list, Value must be 1 - 20. Default 20.

parameters.name: sortField
parameters.description: Sort fields on which you want to sort the output.

x-docgen-enum-table-extension.description: Sort on job date.
Sort on job status.

parameters.name: sortOrder
parameters.description: Sort order for the query you want to perform.

x-docgen-enum-table-extension.description: Sort in ascending order.
Sort in descending order.

parameters.name: createdAfter
parameters.description: A date used for selecting jobs created after (or at) a specified time must be in ISO 8601 format. Required if LastUpdatedAfter is not specified.Specifying both CreatedAfter and LastUpdatedAfter returns an error.

parameters.name: createdBefore
parameters.description: A date used for selecting jobs created before (or at) a specified time must be in ISO 8601 format.

parameters.name: lastUpdatedAfter
parameters.description: A date used for selecting jobs updated after (or at) a specified time must be in ISO 8601 format. Required if createdAfter is not specified.Specifying both CreatedAfter and LastUpdatedAfter returns an error.

parameters.name: lastUpdatedBefore
parameters.description: A date used for selecting jobs updated before (or at) a specified time must be in ISO 8601 format.

parameters.name: scheduleStartDate
parameters.description: A date used for filtering jobs schedule after (or at) a specified time must be in ISO 8601 format. schedule end date should not be earlier than schedule start date.

parameters.name: scheduleEndDate
parameters.description: A date used for filtering jobs schedule before (or at) a specified time must be in ISO 8601 format. schedule end date should not be earlier than schedule start date.

parameters.name: marketplaceIds
parameters.description: Used to select jobs that were placed in the specified marketplaces.

post.description:
Adds an appointment to the service job indicated by the service job identifier you specify.

**Usage Plan:**

| Rate (requests per second) | Burst |
| ---- | ---- |
| 5 | 20 |

For more information, see "Usage Plans and Rate Limits" in the Selling Partner API documentation.

parameters.name: serviceJobId
parameters.description: An Amazon defined service job identifier.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Add appointment operation input details.

| 5 | 20 |
